jobTitle: Business Development Manager, Liquid Media - Remote
description:
About Us

We are a full-service creative agency dedicated to innovation and excellence in the dynamic world of gaming and esports. Our roots stem from the unparalleled success of Team Liquid, a leading force in esports, renowned worldwide. Partnering with industry giants like Riot Games, Alienware (Dell), and Nike, we offer comprehensive services to brands across various consumer sectors. Join us on an exciting journey to shape the future of gaming culture and expand our global footprint.

Our Offerings

Influencer Marketing: Crafting bespoke campaigns tailored to gaming and esports audiences, from strategy development to execution and performance analysis.

Content Production: Collaborating closely with brands and gaming entities to create resonant content that speaks the language of gamers.

Social Media Strategy: Elevating brands' presence on social platforms with engaging content strategies designed to captivate gaming communities.

Consultancy Services: Providing insights and strategies for engaging with Gen Z audiences across diverse marketing channels.

Experiential Events: Designing and executing immersive tournament experiences both in real life and virtually, amplifying brand engagement.

The Role

Are you a dynamic individual with a knack for identifying and capitalizing on new business opportunities? Are you passionate about exceeding sales goals and shaping creative narratives? We're seeking a Business Development Manager to join our team. As a key player, you'll drive sales growth, nurture client relationships, and champion innovative ideas to propel our agency forward.

Location: Los Angeles, CA or Remote

Responsibilities

Cultivating and expanding the new business pipeline.

Leveraging industry expertise and networks to build lasting client relationships.

Generating new opportunities and rekindling previous connections.

Crafting and delivering persuasive sales presentations to potential clients.

Collaborating with the executive team to develop effective client acquisition strategies.

Overseeing project deliverables and sales planning for seamless execution.

Maintaining accurate records of client interactions and sales activities.

Requirements

Minimum 5 years of experience in business development within advertising and marketing.

Strong agency background with a proven track record in sales pitching and ideation.

Excellent communication, project management, and negotiation skills.

Proficiency in CRM and sales pipeline planning software.

Proactive approach with a history of delivering exceptional results.

Bonus Points For

Experience in gaming, entertainment, or sports categories within advertising and marketing.

Advanced storytelling skills to craft compelling narratives for clients.

Benefits

Competitive salary range: $75,000.00 - $80,000.00 + bonus opportunities (CA/CO/CT/NY/WA).

Salary adjustments based on skills, experience, and other job-related factors.

Join us in shaping the future of gaming culture and driving innovation in the esports industry. Apply now and become a part of our dynamic team!

Employment Type: Full-Time
